text: [Music]
tap joy is a mobile advertising network
we have relationships with advertisers
as well as publishers we are bidding
into auctions and we have to make really
important decisions about what advert
we're going to be serving and the price
that we're going to be paying for that
for that ad in that bid we have a round
trip time of 300 milliseconds in order
to respond back with bids but for the
data science components we only have
five milliseconds in order to respond so
it's really important that when we're
considering a machine learning platform
that is able to handle high volume and
low latency we previously had a machine
learning platform but it was pretty
primitive at the time and it took us a
long time to
train build and deploy applications into
our infrastructure ultimately we chose
amazon sagemaker because it has a
end-to-end machine learning platform and
is very feature-rich the second is that
it is a managed service and then finally
it has the ability to chop and change
which machine learning framework we want
to use we're not just constrained to one
particular framework we've gone from
taking about three to six months to
train build and deploy a model now with
sagemaker we can do that within a week
perhaps even shorter depending on the
problem
